00028 @interface Broker : SSYDocChildObject < LongTask >
00029 {
00030         enum VerifyPhase verifyPhase ;
00031     int nWaiting ;
00032         // The above array is built while we are
00033         // collecting responses from websites.  After it is done, we then
00034         // add this information to the bookmarks tree.  This is done in the
00035         // primary thread and locks up the user interface, but it is pretty quick.
00036         int iNext ;
00037         int nGot ;
00038         int nToBeRetested ;
00039         int nBroken ;

00043         BOOL failed ;
00044         BOOL doneSending ;

00051         NSMutableArray* _brokenBookmarkHeaders ;
00052         NSMutableArray* _headerGetters ;
00053         NSMutableArray* _autoFixedBookmarks ;
00054         NSMutableArray* _garbageCan ; // a kludge to stop crashes on dual-processor Macs
00055 }
